animals.name: Luna
animals.description: Luna loves playing with pebbles and is very sociable.

animals.name: Sandy
animals.description: Sandy has oversized ears and enjoys the desert sunset.

animals.name: Jasper
animals.description: Jasper is curious and loves climbing trees.

animals.name: Misty
animals.description: Misty is elusive and loves snowy landscapes.

animals.name: Leo
animals.description: Leo, the king of his pride, is majestic and brave.
